Begin forwarded message: 
From: ' 
Date: October 23, 2019 at 09:06:18 EDT 
To: Gloria Allred 
Cc: ' )" 
Subject: Re: Urgent. I have a new alleged victim of E I have a new client who was a victim of Epstein. 
She is willing to fly to New York for the victim meeting on Oct 23. May I call you at 5:45 P.M. to discuss 
9 
Gloria, 
We just needed a little time to rearrange schedules, as we had planned to do noon to 1:00 based on your 
request. However we will plan to come to your office as soon as the meeting this morning is concluded, 
including any individual questions that occur immediately after the general presentation, which occurred but 
was relatively limited following the corresponding meeting in Florida last week. My hope is that we'll be able 
to get to your office by 11:30, and we can email to let you know that we're on our way if that's helpful. 
Alternatively, if you and would prefer to meet at the FBI, that should be fine, you just may have to wait 
for a few minutes following the meeting. We can discuss either way this morning in person, but the upshot is 
that we'll meet with you as soon as possible after the meeting. 
thanks, 
On Oct 23, 2019, at 08:57, Gloria Allred < wrote: 
I  will not have a means to communicate with you after 9:30 this morning, because I will be at the F.B.I. Victim Services 
meeting and they will take my phone. Would you please respond to my message below prior to that time in order that 
I may know the plan for meeting with and me today? 
Gloria 
Allred 
Allred, Maroko & Goldberg 
EFTA00024299

6300 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 1500 
Los Angeles, CA 90048 
www.amglaw.com 
www.gloriaallred.com

From: Gloria Allred 
Sent: Tuesday, October 22, 2019 8:26 PM 
To: 
Cc: ) â€¢ 
Subject: RE: Urgent. I have a new alleged victim of E I have a  new client who was a victim of Epstein. She is willing to 
fly to New York for the victim meeting on Oct. 23. May I call you at 5:45 P.M. to discuss ? 
Is there a place at the FBI for you to interview at the end of the meeting with Victim Services ? I am on a tight 
schedule tomorrow. Please advise if you want to interview her there at 11:A.M or 11:30.at the end of their meeting or 
do wish to use my office at 305 Broadway? I need to leave the interview with her by 12:30. I must take the 2P.M. train 
to D.C. 
Gloria Allred 
Allred, Maroko & Goldberg 
6300 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 1500 
Los Angeles, CA 90048 
www.amglaw.com 
www.gloriaallred.corn
